I've played this game for a long time, mostly on Xbox One when I didn't have a computer to play on, and I really enjoy this game and find it very unique and fun to play. I really enjoy the lore and The Archives because it adds some story line to the game which is cool to me. The game itself is very interesting and can be fun and spooky sometimes with the survivors and killers and I very much enjoy the perk and perk builds that are possible in the game. Overall I really enjoy this game and would very much suggest it to anyone who wants this game and/or think the game's concept is cool. If you like strategic thinking, scary/horror games, and/or fun/fast paced gameplay then this game is most likely for you.

This is the worst game I've ever played...it's my favorite game to play too. DBD is an amazingly fun game to play, when it's playable. The frustration and the joy are both real. I'm happy that it has such an active studio working on it, and at the same time I wish they'd fix a lot of things. But it's playable, and it's honestly the most fun I've had with a video game ever.
我並不分享給其他人，因為這款遊戲需要一些技術才玩得起，除非跟好友多排，不然新手去單排遊戲會破壞其他人的遊戲體驗，另外 此遊戲的BUG非常多，我是說非常非常非常的多，在BUG修正之前，不太推薦入坑

Merhaba oyunu 300 e yakın saat oynadım evet arkadaşlarla oynanabilicek bir oyun gibi gözüküyor ilk başta alıyorsunuz korku gerilim eğlence her şey güzel, ama gel gelelim oyunun errorları optimizasyon hataları bugları hileleri gelen her patchde bitmek bilmeyen ve tekrarlanan system hatalarıyla oyunu oynanmaz bir hale getirdiler son aldığım error 14 dü ve oyunu bırakmıştım.Uzun bi aradan sonra giriş yapmayı denediğimde yine aynı hatayı aldım,şaşırmadım açıkcası zaten çoğu playerda da olduğu gibi benim de saved datam silinmiş(yani bütün emekler çöpe) önermiyorum arkadaşlar 13th friday ve benzeri oyunlara yönelin bu mecradan uzak durun bence.

Granted, I'm a bit bias, but I love Dead by Daylight. It's the kind of game you have a love / hate relationship with, but keep coming back to for more. I've been playing the game since shortly after its release and it has been one of my main games since that time along with helping me to cultivate myself as a horror content creator. It plays on all of my heart strings, my love of classic horror films, the macabre and more, while offering me original content and more to keep the game fresh and the Community Team cares deeply for it's players and the player experience. New players, with each update, there is a learning curve, but invest in learning about the game, the community and watching others play the game. Once you dive in, you'll never want to leave. I can't recommend the game enough to horror fans and those wanting a night filled equally with laughter and screams.
